short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension appends a qualifier to every mention of Donald Trump, noting that he lost the popular vote by nearly 3 million votes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Landslide is a chrome extension that appends a qualifier to every mention of President Donald J. Trump, noting that he fell nearly 3 million votes short of winning the popular vote.
